reviewText: This is the amazing story of Neil Baldwin told in an odd wonderfully quirky way. Toby Jones as Neil is his usual brilliant self. Gemma Jones as Neil's mother  gave the character warmth and depth that was truly worthy of the BAFTA she received. I wish this could somehow find its way to the US. I think everyone everywhere would root for a person like Neil.
One of the funniest films I have seen in years. Cast were superb. Christian ethos without the in-your-face sermons, just a gentle hint. It was so uplifting.
the reason why I bought the Samsung BD-F5700E Multi Region Zone Blu-Ray DVD Player
Very high on my repeat viewing list
